item.title: U.S. Presidential Election Results
item.description: Below is my second Shiny App: It’s an interface for viewing US Presidential election results. (From 1976 - 2016) USA Presidential Elections Sorry Alaska and Hawaii, I haven’t figured out how to add you yet Shiny is a way to create interactive documents that can be easily shared online. You can even host and deploy your apps for free.
